server
Interface QuizServices

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
QuizServant
public interface QuizServices
extends java.rmi.Remote

The QuizServices interface is used to let the clients talk to the server

Author:
yvonne
